project.name: C-C806C-GIMP-05-ST01-DT07-DF12-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C806C-GIMP-05-ST01-DT07-DF12-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved jpg file Has a buffer declared on the heap. malloc(64*sizeOf(char)) If input is shorter than 64 it will overflowdue to using improper sizeof and strlen checking

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
